title: ‘Planet Killer’ Asteroid Spotted That Poses Distant Risk to Earth
description: The space rock had been hidden by the glare of the sun, suggesting that more large asteroids are in a solar system region difficult to study from Earth.
dc:creator: Robin George Andrews
media:description: The Dark Energy Camera at the Víctor M. Blanco 4-meter Telescope in Chile was used to aid the detection of asteroids that orbit between Earth and the sun and are otherwise difficult to spot.
